verses.verse: What <S%G5101><s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> shall we <S%G2046>say<s%> that <S%G11>Abraham<s%>, <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3962>forefather<s%>, hath <S%G2147>found<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>?

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> was <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>, he <S%G2192>hath<s%> whereof to <S%G2745>glory<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4314>toward<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> the <S%G1161>scripture<s%>? And <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> it was <S%G3049>reckoned<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> to him that <S%G2038>worketh<s%>, the <S%G3408>reward<s%> <S%G3049>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3049>reckoned<s%> as <S%G2596>of<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> as <S%G2596>of<s%> <S%G3783>debt<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> to him that <S%G2038>worketh<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G4100>believeth<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> him that <S%G1344>justifieth<s%> the <S%G765>ungodly<s%>, <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> is <S%G3049>reckoned<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%>.

Even <S%G2509>as<s%> <S%G1138>David<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3004>pronounceth<s%> <S%G3108>blessing<s%> upon the <S%G444>man<s%>, unto <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3049>reckoneth<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G5565>apart<s%> from <S%G2041>works<s%>,
saying <S%G3107><s%>, Blessed are they <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G458>iniquities<s%> are <S%G863>forgiven<s%>, <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G266>sins<s%> are <S%G1943>covered<s%>.
Blessed <S%G3107><s%> is the <S%G435>man<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%>, the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> will3049, 3756 <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G3049>reckon<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%>.

Is <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3108>blessing<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> pronounced <S%G1909>upon<s%> the <S%G4061>circumcision<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> the <S%G203>uncircumcision<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>? <S%G1063>for<s%> we <S%G3004>say<s%>, To Abraham11, 3754 his <S%G4102>faith<s%> was <S%G3049>reckoned<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%>.

How <S%G4459><s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> was <S%G3049>it<s%> <S%G3049>reckoned<s%>? when he <S%G5607>was<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G203>uncircumcision<s%>? <S%G3756>Not<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G203>uncircumcision<s%>:

and <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2983>received<s%> the <S%G4592>sign<s%> of <S%G4061>circumcision<s%>, a <S%G4973>seal<s%> of the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of the <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1722>which<s%> he had while he was <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G203>uncircumcision<s%>; <S%G1519>that<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> might <S%G1511>be<s%> the <S%G3962>father<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> them that <S%G4100>believe<s%>, though they <S%G1223>be<s%> in <S%G203>uncircumcision<s%>, <S%G1519>that<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> might be <S%G3049>reckoned<s%> <S%G2532>unto<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3962>father<s%> of <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> to them who <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G3588>are<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4061>circumcision<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G4748>who<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4748>walk<s%> in the <S%G2487>steps<s%> <S%G3962>of<s%> that <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G3962>of<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G1722>which<s%> he had in <S%G203>uncircumcision<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> was the <S%G1860>promise<s%> to <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4690>to<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4690>seed<s%> that <S%G846>he<s%> should <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G2818>heir<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> they that <S%G3588>are<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> are <S%G2818>heirs<s%>, <S%G4102>faith<s%> is made <S%G2758>void<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1860>promise<s%> is made of none <S%G2673>effect<s%>:

for <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G2716>worketh<s%> <S%G3709>wrath<s%>; <S%G1063>but<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> there <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G3761>neither<s%> is there <S%G3847>transgression<s%>.

For <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> cause it is <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> it may be <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G5485>grace<s%>; to the <S%G1519>end<s%> that the <S%G1860>promise<s%> may <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G949>sure<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4690>seed<s%>; <S%G3756>not<s%> to <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> which is <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> to <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> which is <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G3962>father<s%> of <S%G2257>us<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>

<S%G3754><s%> <S%G2531>(as<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%>, A <S%G3962>father<s%> of <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%> have I <S%G5087>made<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%>) <S%G2713>before<s%> him <S%G3739>whom<s%> he <S%G4100>believed<s%>, even <S%G2316>God<s%>, who giveth <S%G2227>life<s%> to the <S%G3498>dead<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2564>calleth<s%> the things that <S%G5607>are<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> though they <S%G5607>were<s%>.

Who <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G3844>against<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%>, to the end <S%G1519>that<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> might <S%G1096>become<s%> a <S%G3962>father<s%> of <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%>, according <S%G2596>to<s%> that which had been <S%G2046>spoken<s%>, <S%G3779>So<s%> <S%G2071>shall<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4690>seed<s%> <S%G2071>be<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3361>without<s%> <S%G770>being<s%> <S%G770>weakened<s%> in <S%G4102>faith<s%> he considered2657, 3756 his <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> <S%G2235>now<s%> as good as <S%G3499>dead<s%> (he being <S%G4225>about<s%> a hundred years <S%G1541>old<s%>), <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3500>deadness<s%> <S%G3388>of<s%> <S%G4564>Sarah<s%>'s <S%G5225>womb<s%>;

yet <S%G1519><s%>, looking unto the <S%G1860>promise<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, he <S%G1252>wavered<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> through <S%G570>unbelief<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> waxed <S%G1743>strong<s%> through <S%G4102>faith<s%>, <S%G1325>giving<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%>,
and <S%G2532><s%> being fully <S%G4135>assured<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> he had <S%G1861>promised<s%>, he <S%G2076>was<s%> <S%G1415>able<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to <S%G4160>perform<s%>.
<S%G2532><s%> <S%G1352>Wherefore<s%> also it was <S%G3049>reckoned<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> it <S%G1125>was<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1223>sake<s%> <S%G3440>alone<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> it was <S%G3049>reckoned<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>;

but <S%G235><s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> our <S%G2248>sake<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>, unto <S%G3739>whom<s%> it <S%G3195>shall<s%> be <S%G3049>reckoned<s%>, <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> him that <S%G1453>raised<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%>,

who <S%G3739><s%> was <S%G3860>delivered<s%> up <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3900>trespasses<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> was <S%G1453>raised<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G1347>justification<s%>.
